item.description:
Week 1 of our three week Kaleidoscope Series, sponsored by Bay Path College.

This event is FREE!

Week 1: Finding Your Niche and Getting Your Finances In Order

Tuesday, September 27th, 7:00 PM

Speakers: Val Nelson, Career & Business Coach,
Donna Safford-Fleury, CLTC, Financial Advisor, Vinson Associates

How do you set yourself apart from others so that your product or service stands out? Learn why and how to choose your unique niche.
Do you know how to manage the money side of your business? This workshop will help you navigate the many elements involved in developing and building a strong and successful business.
item.name: Finding Your Niche and Getting Your Finances In Order
